title: Blender

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• Plug the switch and blender into the It-Click-On-Plus
• Use the settings on the It-Click-On Plus to activate the blender for 5 seconds (timed setting)
• Prompt the switch user to activate the switch to make sure their smoothie/soup is blended properly, this make take a few presses to complete!

tooltipText: Use a Click-It-On (or similar) to turn on a blender and make a smoothie
